doc.title: Yoshiwara Club
doc.plot: An arresting horror extravaganza. A kaleidoscopic journey into the world of the night, among hunters and preys. The Dude, the tombeur des femmes playboy type of guy, enters the hi-class Yoshiwara Club, where he will find superb cocktails, exhilarating rhythms, gorgeous winking dancers and the most beautiful girls in town. The Dude's aim is to pick up, as fast as possible and as many as he can! But that night he meets Lilith the Dark Lady, the Domina-like type of girl... and his adventure is going to take a completely different turn. Who is the hunter and who is the prey, now? A short but eye-opening essay on fast-flirting techniques. A modern morality play that need no dialogue to tell its story: a pure visual journey, just images and music.
